an7.62:1.3: Abhijanami kho panaham, bhikkhave, digharattam katanam punnanam digharattam ittham kantam manapam vipakam paccanubhutam.
an7.62:1.5: Satta vassani mettacittam bhavetva satta samvattavivattakappe nayimam lokam punagamasim.
an7.62:1.6: Samvattamane sudaham, bhikkhave, loke abhassarupago homi,
an7.62:2.1: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, brahma homi mahabrahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti.
an7.62:2.2: Chattimsakkhattum kho panaham, bhikkhave, sakko ahosim devanamindo;
an7.62:2.3: anekasatakkhattum raja ahosim cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
an7.62:2.4: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, imani satta ratanani ahesum, seyyathidam—
an7.62:2.5: cakkaratanam, hatthiratanam, assaratanam, maniratanam, itthiratanam, gahapatiratanam, parinayakaratanameva sattamam.
an7.62:2.6: Parosahassam kho pana me, bhikkhave, putta ahesum sura virangarupa parasenappamaddana.
an7.62:2.7: So imam pathavim sagarapariyantam adandena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhavasinti.
